ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So We cast him up onto the beach and he was sick;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So We cast him, sick, on a barren shore,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But We threw him on a wide bare tract of land while he was ill;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We cast him out of the fish unto dry land and he was sick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We then put him ashore on a plain, and he was sick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But We cast him forth on the naked shore while he was sick,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We cast him on to the vacant surface of the earth while he was sick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but We cast him upon the wilderness, and he was sick,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then We cast him on a desert shore while he was sick;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But We caused him to be cast forth on to the beach, sick as he was,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We cast him on a bare desert whilst he was sick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We cast him on a bare shore, and he was sick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But We cast him forth on the naked shore in a state of sickness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But We cast him forth on the naked shore while he was sick,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But We cast him, upon the shore, and he was ill,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then We threw him into the wilderness, and he was sick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:145] Then We cast him, We flung him out of the belly of the whale, onto the barren land, onto the face of the earth, that is, onto the shore on that same day — or three, or seven, or twenty, or forty days later — and he was sick, ailing like a [newly-born] featherless chick.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We cast him on a desert shore while he was sick) he was as weak as a little child;
